org.cookbookgeeks.webkochbuch.service

Class IngredientHibernateService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cookbookgeeks.webkochbuch.dao.GenericHibernateDao<Ingredient,java.lang.Long>
      • org.cookbookgeeks.webkochbuch.dao.IngredientHibernateDao
        • org.cookbookgeeks.webkochbuch.service.IngredientHibernateService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GenericDao<Ingredient,java.lang.Long>, IngredientDao, IngredientService

    @Service(value="ingredientService")
public class IngredientHibernateService
extends IngredientHibernateDao
implements IngredientService
    Service class for ingredient related database operations. This class contains methods that are more business related than in the Daos.
    Author:
    Nils Sommer
